TopicTitle: Announcing the latest member of the KSP Team.

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I\'m happy to announce the addition of a new member to our team. He\'ll be helping out a lot in creating the content that KSP needs.

Give a warm welcome to **Content Designer, Jeff C, aka NovaSilisko**

I think he pretty much requires no introduction. He\'s been a very active member in the community, and he\'s made a lot of contributions to the game. I\'ll let him do his speech next. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Cheers

Thank you! I\'ll do my very best to help make KSP the best game of the century. 

(Do these blue bars make me look fat?)

HA! See Nova!! Did I not tell you to stick it out and everything would work out in the end?

I\'m really happy about this, Nova has been very instrumental in getting the mod community off the ground back in the Early Daysâ„¢.

Cheers!

Skunky
Well played, sir. Well played. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Oh god.

Oh god.

WE.

ARE.

GOING.

TO.

HAVE.

THE BEST GAME IN EXISTENCE.
Excellent choice Squad! Grats Nova!

Congratulations Nova!

I\'m sure quite a few people expected this to happen sooner or later. Knowing your quality of work, KSP will somehow become even greater than it already is!

Congrats again, NovaSilisko!

- Radion

Congrats, its good to see all your hard work has paid off. I\'m looking forward to working with you on future updates. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Congratulations !! 

With dedicated people like this, this game is going to be just even more awesome.

Congragulations Nova! Good to see you become a bigger piece of the community each day! (And no, the blue bars don\'t make you look fat.)

P.S, spelled congratulations wrong on purpose for you.

Fantastic! This is another prof that *Kerbal Space Program* is made not only by it\'s developers, but also by it\'s community, as almost anyone have being able to do before! Congratulations to you Nova! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Many congrats Nova!

Congratulations Nova ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif), my anticipation level for 0.16 has just increased by a several orders of magnitude. We are going to have so many new stock parts to play with ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). The design possibilities, ... think of the design possibilities!

Sweet jesus....

I love how you guys are recruiting from the community. That is so cool.

First C7 and now Nova, what can I say... This is going to be so epic!

0.15 was 'C7\'s version', so 0.16 is yours ;P
Congratulations! I suppose this\'ll make it easier for you to sneak more awesome features in. ;D
Congratz, no doubt this is a win win for everyone.

Definitely the right choice.

And i do agree with picking from the modding community, these people are proving themselves, and this is deserved in the fullest. There were already textures made with Nova\'s addition, so i suppose this is natural.

Congrats man. Will you be porting your mods over to vanilla a la C7, leaving them or continuing to work on them on the side?

Either way, great choice Squad, it\'s fantastic how you are hiring straight out of the modding community.
Congratulations, buddy.
I knew this was going to happen at some point. Congrats bro!
Congratulations!
Congratz Nova! Keep on your quest to make sure not everything starts with a K in this game ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

'We\'re doomed.' 

Just kidding, congrats! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Good call Squad, I am sure Nova will fit into the team, but just wondering, are some you guys working off site or do you just move to Mexico City to work there?
